hints.content:
$495 = 621-\,?$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 621 back to point 495 is labeled, minus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/bdcd987755f620b9d6ca11cd190bf4bf5d4aef1b)

Let's start by subtracting hundreds from ${621}$ until we get as close to  ${495}$ as possible without going below ${495}$.

${621} -\purpleD{100}=521$

If we subtract $\purpleD{1 \text{ hundred}}$, or $\purpleD{100}$, we reach $521$. We cannot subtract any more hundreds without going below ${495}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 621 back to a new point 521 labeled, "minus 100"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/559f2608b2f800f7169f84ffdcccc034e88fe0e3)

Next, we can subtract tens from $521$ until we get as close to  ${495}$ as possible without going below ${495}$.

$\begin{align}
521 -\blueD{10}=511\\\\
511 - \blueD{10} = 501
\end{align}$

If we subtract $\blueD{2 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{20}$, we reach $501$. We cannot subtract any more tens without going below ${495}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 521 to a new point 501 labeled, "minus 20"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b6b283d5acfc9d55ea40dc8ac17c1e58e4de6498)

Finally, how many ones should we subtract from $501$ to get to  ${495}?$

$\begin{align}
501-\greenD{1}={500}\\\\
500-\greenD{5}={495}
\end{align}$

If we subtract $\greenD{6\text{ ones}}$ from $501$, we reach ${495}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 501 back to point 495 labeled, "minus 6"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/491ac6d9b8b9bc66fa1995c40905d9ef29a8b16b)

We subtracted $\purpleD{1 \text{ hundred}}$, $\blueD{2 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{6 \text{ ones}}$ from $\blueD{621}$ to get to $\greenD{495}$.

$\purpleD{100}+\blueD{20}+\greenD{6}=\goldE{126}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 621 back to point 495 is labeled, "minus 126." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "minus 100," "minus 20," and "minus 6."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4d82d5614f11a4402253a24827bdac6c4c0c1cdf)

question.content:
